729819f-b.title: Richmond: Victory Boulevard - Baron Boulevard
729819f-b.text:
(1)
3S12 Victory Boulevard, east side, between Baron Boulevard
and Ridgeway Avenue (south of Travis Avenue). Butler's 1853 map
designates this old house as a schoolhouse. On the 1899 and 1907
maps it appears as the property of Ridgeway.
May 19, 1932
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
(2)
Another view of the o ld school house and adjoining dwellings,
looking north.
May 19, 1932
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
729819f-b.folder: Victory Boulevard & Baron Boulevard, Staten Island, NY
